Title(s): ‘A tretys of oure ladye howe sche was wedded’
_description: ‘A tretys of oure ladye howe sche was wedded’ — 1678 lines in couplets

CULAdd4122.First Lines:
Ladye alowed in goddys lawesffor mayden & moder of
                    soþfaste sawes…
CULAdd4122.Last Lines:
…At coleyn her bodyes er gravedAnd her soules in heven be
                    saved Amen
CULAdd4122.Editions:
Reichl,  Karl. 
             “Ein mittelenglisches Marienleben aus der HS. Add. 4122 der University
                Library in Cambridge.” 
             Anglia
         95 (1977): 313-58: 322-58.
